title: EOS Climbs 10.25% In Rally
text:
EOS Climbs 10.25% In Rally

Investing.com - was trading at $3.0936 by 03:54 (01:54 GMT) on the Investing.com Index on Tuesday, up 10.25% on the day. It was the largest one-day percentage gain since Saturday, September 7, 2019.

The move upwards pushed EOS's market cap up to $2.8610B, or 1.28% of the total cryptocurrency market cap. At its highest, EOS's market cap was $17.5290B.

EOS had traded in a range of $2.9450 to $3.0945 in the previous twenty-four hours.

Over the past seven days, EOS has seen a drop in value, as it lost 17.67%. The volume of EOS traded in the twenty-four hours to time of writing was $1.9662B or 3.22% of the total volume of all cryptocurrencies. It has traded in a range of $2.6147 to $3.2165 in the past 7 days.

At its current price, EOS is still down 86.54% from its all-time high of $22.98 set on Sunday, April 29, 2018.

Elsewhere in cryptocurrency trading

was last at $8,286.4 on the Investing.com Index, up 3.19% on the day.

was trading at $181.51 on the Investing.com Index, a gain of 6.54%.

Bitcoin's market cap was last at $148.7261B or 66.44% of the total cryptocurrency market cap, while Ethereum's market cap totaled $19.4713B or 8.70% of the total cryptocurrency market value.
